activities:
CRA Assessments offers validated monitoring visit simulations, objective grading and comprehensive metrics to assist clients with the evaluation of current and potential Clinical Research Associates.
We receive the CRA's contact information (name and email) and may receive basic demographic information (years of monitoring experience, degree, manager, title, years of experience at the company and primary language) in order to setup the user account and create metrics after the simulation has been scored.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and User data.  This data is manually processed.
privacyprograms: a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: CRA Assessment's Privacy Officer receives complaints and reports of non-compliance sent to info@CRAAssessments.com. Any investigations which are warranted will be conducted by CRA Assessments, the results of which and any recommended corrective actions will be reported to the Privacy Officer. CRA Assessments will utilize the services of the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for dispute resolution and will cooperate and comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
